name: NeciusWithGears V1.2
description: A lot of rain since Angro, Marche's father, was finally able to fix his old father's respirator, Angro proved his daughter's worth by sending her to collect 100 PZS that are scattered in an old place where an atrocious accident by a Zepeling 60 years ago .as proof of maturity, quality of life of an old man, and of course, an adventure, Marche would not say no to that.
